title: Birds as symbols of factions in Runterra
body:
Ok, so anyone ever seen a red winged black bird? They look like this little guy here:
https://goo.gl/images/CiG9wJ
This little guy has his own damn pauldrons! 
I could see a noxian scout team having a Runterra equivalent of this guy here.
Wonder if a noxian scout support character would run with something like this, like Quinn for demacia, but really play up the noxian spy/scout company people. A crow like Swain's would be a dead giveaway that Noxians were about, but this bird would look more commonplace, or champion specific? 

Maybe the champ has a noxian banner/spear pole it comes and lands on?

Anyway, what normal birds or animals do you think look or represent Factions from Runeterra? [](https://goo.gl/images/CiG9wJ)

Sorry in advance for me being so bad with links on boards.

replies.body:
I believe flying squirrels would represent Yordles.

Yes, I know they're not birds, but you know I'm right.

> [{quoted}](name=A Swarm of Koala,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=04qgagYc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-03T03:02:33.048+0000)
>
> I believe flying squirrels would represent Yordles.
> 
> Yes, I know they're not birds, but you know I'm right.

With cheeks packed full of nuts! I see it perfectly!

This is my jam! I'll stick to birds because that's my specific area of special interest.

Bilgewater - Scarlet Macaw, obvious choice for both mascot and scout bird. Of course we all know what those look like.
Ionia - There are a lot of possible picks for this one, but my vote for a mascot would go to any of several species of bird of paradise, because they look borderline magical. As for scouting birds, I'd go with a White-throated Magpie-jay - it's almost like a fantasy version of an ordinary blue jay! And it's a corvid, which makes it quite an intelligent bird. 
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JsmW2B0k19Y/T1gHIIw1NNI/AAAAAAAAB9E/08bm0v1P5-0/s1600/WhitethroatedMagpieJay2CostaJM.jpg

Noxus - While Red-winged Blackbirds seem to scream "NOXUS," I'd expect the empire to pick a bird of prey as its avian mascot, or as a scouting bird. Falconry is just one of the innumerable respectable military disciplines in Noxus, of course, so Quinn probably has quite a few counterparts on the other side. Check out a dark-morph Red-tailed Hawk: 
http://www.schmoker.org/BirdPics/Photos/Raptors/RTHA_DkAdFly9.jpg 
Side note: I've seen some fan art of Darius as a bird and he looks uncannily like one of these.

Demacia - They've probably already selected the azurite eagle (Valor's species, which isn't a thing IRL) for both tasks, so it's harder to pick a real-life bird for the job.

Shurima - You might think of ostriches when you think of the desert, but it's probably more feasible to select a bustard for a mascot:
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9e/Ardeotis_kori_Etosha.JPG/1280px-Ardeotis_kori_Etosha.JPG 
Scouting birds would probably be hawks or falcons, just like in Noxus, but of course different types. Something like this Red-necked Falcon could do nicely: 
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/0c/Red-Necked_Falcon.JPG

Freljord - None of the three tribes would go with a bird, I think. If they did? Sea eagle (this one is a Steller's Sea Eagle): 
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/d2/Haliaeetus_pelagicus%2C_Rausu%2C_Hokkaido%2C_Japan.jpg

Piltover/Zaun and the areas uninhabited by living humans are harder to work out. Aside from those mysterious manta-like creatures in the Zaun artwork, I feel Piltover and Zaun would probably select mechanical birds as mascots.
And I'm gonna just agree with A Swarm of Koala about Bandle City!

Perhaps I lean too much toward birds of prey, but they're appropriately fierce mascots while also being intelligent enough to do scouting and perhaps even combat maneuvers with their handler - multipurpose! 
Also, it's not just me: many major league sports teams in North America have chosen a bird of prey as a mascot: Hawks, Falcons, Seahawks, Raptors, Eagles...
Shurima would be like a hawk or eagle or something

> [{quoted}](name=CauseSCIENCE,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=04qgagYc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-03T03:08:29.253+0000)
>
> Shurima would be like a hawk or eagle or something

Maybe it has claws for burrowing under the sand? Just sounds cool and I totally bet azir decreeing eagles as household animals! He's totally full of himself and his empire.

Barn owls for the Shadow Isles, post-Ruination.

Great horned owls for the Blessed Isles, pre-Ruination.

There are these [manta ray-like bat creatures that can be seen flying high above Zaun in its concept art](https://m.imgur.com/a/yKA8Faz) (maybe Bio can tell us more about them?). I imagine they would make a pretty cool symbol/companion for a scout champion from Zaun.
